member.name: T:VDS.RDF.Writing.HtmlSchemaWriter
member.summary: HTML Schema Writer is a HTML Writer which writes a human readable description of a Schema/Ontology.

member.name: M:VDS.RDF.Writing.HtmlSchemaWriter.Save(VDS.RDF.IGraph,System.IO.TextWriter)
member.summary: Saves the Result Set to the given Stream as an XHTML Table with embedded RDFa.

member.name: M:VDS.RDF.Writing.HtmlSchemaWriter.GenerateOutput(VDS.RDF.Writing.Contexts.HtmlWriterContext)
member.summary: Internal method which generates the HTML Output for the Graph.

member.name: M:VDS.RDF.Writing.HtmlSchemaWriter.RaiseWarning(System.String)
member.summary: Helper method for raising the Warning event.

member.name: E:VDS.RDF.Writing.HtmlSchemaWriter.Warning
member.summary: Event which is raised if there is a non-fatal error with the RDF being output

member.name: M:VDS.RDF.Writing.HtmlSchemaWriter.ToString
member.summary: Gets the String representation of the writer which is a description of the syntax it produces.
